p.span: Oneida City schools are closed through May 15, 2020. Please click HERE for up-to-date information on school closures.

a.span: April 17 UPDATE: Message About Building Closures

div.p: On behalf of the Oneida City School District, we hope you and your families are remaining safe and doing your best to follow guidance regarding measures to contain the spread of COVID-19 within our community. Events hav …

a.span: March Thought Exchange on Graduation Rate

div.p: This month we would like to ask our community their thoughts about graduation. As a district, we continue to work on our graduation rate to ensure that all of our students reach their fullest potential. …
